channel.title: Client help needed ! {SOLVED}
channel.description:
hey,
You know how the client is automatically on 127.0.0.1/localhost , what would i put for a mate to join from a different computer.
Thanks...
Add me on msn if you can help us that way - Bsk2810@hotmail.co.uk
Or post here thanks . :D

item.title: Client help needed ! {SOLVED}
item.dc:creator: @neil1111 neil1111
item.description:
@neil1111 wrote:

um change it to your no-ip
so instead of it being 127.0.0.1. it would be ****.no-ip.org

im not 100% sure if this is it or not, but i think it is.

item.title: Client help needed ! {SOLVED}
item.dc:creator: @Realisticx Realisticx
item.description:
@Realisticx wrote:

ok mate we have a no-ip address so were should i put it in below?

        anInt957 = 10; //high detial //1?
        anInt958 = 0;
       // method52(false); //false
        aBoolean959 = true;
	
        signlink.storeid = 32; //not really needed for us
        signlink.startpriv(InetAddress.getLocalHost());	   
        method2(503, false, 765); //sets gameframe size

Theres another part also to the local host

anInt957 = 10;
anInt958 = 0;
aBoolean959 = true;

   	    try {
            signlink.startpriv(InetAddress.getLocalHost());
                }
	    catch(UnknownHostException uhe) {
		return;
	    }
            client client1 = new client();
            client1.method1(503, false, 765);
            return;
	}

Thanks if you can help mate

Read full topic

item.description:
@neil1111 wrote:

i think you would need to make a no-ip adress and change the localhost to the no-ip you make.

forgot, you also need to portforward, theres tuts on here about it.
